falsificationAttempts.description: Searched for run-level overrides and inspected the scoring/evidence-binding workflows.
falsificationAttempts.result: `experiments_scoring_seed_requests` reads `experiment.config.scoring_stage.sample_count`, and `bindExperimentEvidence` reads `experiment.config.scoring_stage.evidence_cap`, with no alternative providers.

notes: All observed consumers pull counts exclusively from `experiment.config.scoring_stage`; no hidden overrides or run-level sources were discovered, so the hypothesis stands as stated.
